mapper.insert: INSERT INTO top_inscorpinfo ( ID, INSCORP_CODE, INSCORP_NAME, INS_SIMPLE_NAME, INSCORP_LEVEL, UPCORP_CODE, INSCORP_EN_NAME, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, PHONE, FAX, EMAIL, STATUS, OPERATOR_CODE, OPERATOR_BANK, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, COMMON_COUNTER_FLAG, COMMON_NET_FLAG, COMMON_CHECK_FLAG, COMMON_NOSSDCHECK_FLAG, COMMON_SYSTB_FLAG, CHANNEL_FLAG )VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insCorpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insCorpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insSimpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insCorpLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upCorpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insCorpEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonCountFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonNetFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonCheckFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonNossdcheckFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonSystbFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE top_inscorpinfo SET INSCORP_CODE = #{insCorpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSCORP_NAME = #{insCorpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INS_SIMPLE_NAME =#{insSimpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSCORP_LEVEL=#{insCorpLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPCORP_CODE = #{upCorpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSCORP_EN_NAME = #{insCorpEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTCODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE =#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_CODE =#{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_BANK = #{operatorBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMON_COUNTER_FLAG = #{commonCountFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMON_NET_FLAG = #{commonNetFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMON_CHECK_FLAG = #{commonCheckFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMON_NOSSDCHECK_FLAG = #{commonNossdcheckFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMON_SYSTB_FLAG = #{commonSystbFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_FLAG = #{channelFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
